lead_paragraph: ADES--Robert. It is with deep sorrow that the Officers, Board of Governors, members and staff of Fresh Meadow Country Club mourn the loss of our esteemed member, Robert Ades. The Adeses have been members of Fresh Meadow for 24 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to his wife, Esther, sons Joseph (Deborah), Michael (Lisa), David (Elana) and Bill (Aileen), his brother Albert Ades (Sylvia), sister Renee Levy (Stephen), his grandchildren and the entire Ades family. Lee D. Charles, President Howard Hershenhorn, Secretary 1/3
